h1: How Many Calories in a Tablespoon of Mayonnaise?
assumptions: Regular full-fat mayonnaise; standard serving size of 1 tablespoon (~13-15 g); commercial brand like Hellmann's, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, homemade vs. store-bought, and exact serving size. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of regular mayonnaise contains about 94 kcal, mostly from fat.

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of mayonnaise?
faqs.a: About 94 kcal per tablespoon of regular full-fat mayonnaise.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories for light mayo?
faqs.a: Light versions have around 35-50 kcal per tbsp, lower fat content.

faqs.q: Does mayonnaise have carbs or protein?
faqs.a: Negligible—0.1 g carbs and 0.1 g protein per tbsp.

faqs.q: How does brand affect mayonnaise calories?
faqs.a: Brands vary slightly; e.g., some reduced-fat options are 40-60 kcal per tbsp.
